name: nestedContainer(keyedBy:forKey:)
desc: Returns the data stored for the given key as represented in a container keyed by the given key type.
declaration: func nestedContainer<NestedKey>(keyedBy type: NestedKey.Type, forKey key: KeyedDecodingContainer<K>.Key) throws -> KeyedDecodingContainer<NestedKey> where NestedKey : CodingKey
